title: observation schema
description: Schema for run-bound observations describing structural patterns among artifacts.

run_id.description: Identifier of the run that produced this observation.

time.description: Timestamp when the observation was recorded.

scope.description: Optional scope of the observation (e.g. claim, relation, domain, cross-domain).

targets.description: Optional list of artifact identifiers this observation refers to.

pattern.description: Name of the observed structural pattern.

description.description: Optional human-readable description of what was observed.

evidence.description: Optional explanation of why this pattern was identified.

confidence.description: Optional qualitative confidence indicator (e.g. low, medium, high). Must not be numeric.

notes.description: Optional free-text notes. Must not introduce interpretation or evaluation.
